titles.title: Recess Appointment Restoration Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to specify further conditions under which payment for the services of a recess appointee may not be made from the Treasury.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 4/17/2012--Introduced. Recess Appointment Restoration Act - Prohibits payment from the Treasury to any individual who is appointed to fill a vacancy that must be filled by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, until such appointee has been confirmed by the Senate, unless such individual was appointed while the Senate was adjourned for at least 10 days.
